mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO vi_psurvey_alarm_detail (alarm_id, task_id, bkid, alarm_type, alarm_type_name, feature, oss_url, similarity, object_id, name, picid, time, status, survey_status, alarm_status, ai_status) values
(#{item.alarmId}, #{item.taskId}, #{item.bkid}, #{item.alarmType}, #{item.alarmTypeName}, #{item.feature}, #{item.ossUrl}, #{item.similarity}, #{item.objectId}, #{item.name}, #{item.picid}, #{item.time}, #{item.status}, #{item.surveyStatus}, #{item.alarmStatus}, #{item.aiStatus})
